title: I for one, welcome Handsome Jack as our newest champion.

embed.description: One word! #Hype The new champion is coming to fu*k u in the ass xD All rights to Riot games i dont own anything shown in this video

body: Pandora just wasn't enough and with the Telltale games ending he [needed a new gig.](http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FVmGWMapV7A/Vo1k4tv7cII/AAAAAAAA2eY/NZ9NHUI83P8/s1920/7.jpg)

replies.body: I hope they call him handsome Jim to avoid any copyright issues

> [{quoted}](name=PapaGreg21,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=2NY4wFuE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-06T20:01:00.505+0000)
>
> I hope they call him handsome Jim to avoid any copyright issues

Handsome Jhin.

At first I was reminded of:
http://cdn.pcgamesn.com/sites/default/files/Overwatch%20Reaper.jpg
Then it was:
http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/11116/111165168/4051891-0134234876-20121.png
But who could forget this lovely fellow:
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/8WZ0XSf23rs/maxresdefault.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=ZevYoc,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=2NY4wFuE,comment-id=00040002,timestamp=2016-01-06T21:45:02.397+0000)
>
> When is he going to be released?

I bet at the end of January, or at the beginning of February (if everything goes smoothly).
Actually, I disagree. On Twitter Riot said that the next patch would be next week on Tuesday, and Gypsy keeps saying he's almost ready, so I'm betting on next week.

It's not going to be released THAT early. Need to have him you know; soak in the PBe for awhile. Let people cry OP and whine and fill our marvellous marksman's bathtub with tears. But don't fret; he'll make you beautiful. More beautiful than you are now. 

(Unless we're talking about PBE release. Then uh. You're right.)

I'm pretty sure he means that's how soon he'll show up on the PBE, so he'll likely release to live near the end of January, but going on the PBE next patch would make sense based on previous champ teasers (i.e. Reek's was pushed to PBE roughly a week after her teaser about the desert caravan came up, similar to Bard's teaser timeframe as well)
Ah, my bad for wording it incorrectly. I meant that he would be going on the PBE around next week, and should be revealed then too, not on live servers. My B

Precisely, next patch, the one on PBE, is going to be live next week.
And you can check on PBE, there's no trace of any Jhin.
Sadly, not the 5th of November
Remember, remember, the fifth of November.
I thought of V for Vendetta but I don't know why I didn't think of Amon as he's such a badass mofo, it was rly epic that season
So no Vega/Claw from Street Fighter I take it?
Reaper style phasing would totally "break fundamental game flow". :P

Fun fact: Dameon Clarke, Handsome Jack's voice actor has already done work for Riot.

{{champion:121}}

I did not know that

The more you know!

And knowing is half the battle!

G. I. Joe!!!!

{{champion:91}}, {{champion:61}}, {{champion:236}}, and {{champion:74}} on a train to the Freljord, when suddenly,
"Welcome to Valoran, kiddos!" 
Train explodes.
Project {{champion:11}}  over talon and i am down for this  :D
But Talon actually turns invisible.
{{champion:134}} as the Siren
{{champion:36}} You forgot the axe-crazy maniac.

Zer0, Mechromancer, Salvador, and Axton.
  Brilliant.

When I saw the mask, I immediately thought "Overseer" from Dishonored.
http://media3.s-nbcnews.com/j/streams/2012/october/121007/1c4182860-overseer-wolfhoundtease.nbcnews-fp-1200-800.jpg

Don't you mean Sander Cohen?

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/bioshock/images/5/56/Sander-cohen.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20091204190657
I was thinking the exact same thing. The trailer immediately reminded me of Mr. Cohen, I just got that vibe from it.

I was sort of thinking more of this guy 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5tE8ivbR2wo

Dr. Steinman... worst. plastic surgeon. ever.
i for one have never cared so little about a champions release in my life and that says a lot.
Well it ain't Ao Shin :-/
Eh, everyone likes their own thing. I wasn't too excited about Tahm Kench... though I did end up liking his lines so there's that.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/q3HszOT-Bpc/maxresdefault.jpg

http://hydra-media.cursecdn.com/overwatch.gamepedia.com/thumb/7/74/Reaper-portrait.png/350px-Reaper-portrait.png?version=9617a858b37def794fbf39b907959e5f

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/villains/images/d/d1/Amon-avatar.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140420022712


https://i.ytimg.com/vi/OgthCs7G_q8/hqdefault.jpg


would all like to have a death with you ... I MEAN word with you ;)
{{champion:203}} Don't forget us!

Welcome to the Rift, kiddos.

{{champion:25}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:74}}  {{champion:11}} {{champion:1}}  {{champion:36}}

more like
{{champion:74}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:11}} (project) {{champion:134}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:23}}
I hope he gets butt stallion (or {{champion:120}} with a butt stallion skin) as a companion
"Welcome to the Rift Kiddos!"
Anyone else realize... I think we just saw Zed without his (flippin') ninja clothes on...
I'm so glad I'm not the only one who thought that.
If he does not have a Butt Stallion quote I will be sad.
It is kind of funny because i just finished the "tales from the borderlands" game. A week later I see this and I'm like "alright, handsome jack returns....in the wrong game".

So after Jack died in Borderlands 2, his soul somehow found itself to Runeterra and is now creating chaos once more. GJ! I love the collaboration! 

P.S: Seriously though, Jhin's Mask vaguely resembles Handsome Jack's Mask. AND THEY BOTH START WITH THE LETTER "J"!
He looks like another ad carry with lots of mobility and a ap ratio on w or e
What if he was an ap carry that has scalled auto's to his ap.

So basically he would have reverse stats where his AP would scale up instead of his AD?

To give you an idea he would have 0 AD but base stat in AP and his basics did magic damage instead of physical?

{{item:3020}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3048}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3089}}  A build something like this perhaps?

Totally need more and more and mroe 
and mroe and ome and mero 
and more and more andmore 
**and more** AND MORE **AND MORE**
more, more, champions

http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m5cr2uKczt1rwcc6bo1_500.gif
man they tried to be edgy so bad.
its definitely not handsome jack ;)
So where is this teaser? Haven't logged on today.
